text: George Thomas Robertson (May 11, 1927 - January 9, 2021) was a Canadian professional ice hockey forward. He played 31 games in the National Hockey League for the Montreal Canadiens from 1944 to 1955. Robertson was born in Winnipeg, Manitoba. Robertson died on January 9, 2021 at the age of 93.George Thomas Robertson ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:Ice hockey people from Manitoba Category:Sportspeople from Winnipeg
title: George Robertson (ice hockey)
